story.name: DownloadCSVfile.story
story.scenarios:
Scenario:(1) Start to login the Openl10n site Given Delete all cookies before start testing When the user has opened the Openl10n webpage Then the user enters username 15202184317@qq.com and password 123qwe!@#QWE to Openl10n login page Then click the Login submit button of Openl10n Page Then the Openl10n main page should be displayed
Scenario:(2) Download the CSV file for one specific product Then Get values from the parameters Then click 'Download' button
